annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The contractor shall notify relevant personal data breaches to the controller without undue delay and at the latest within 48 hours after the contractor becomes aware of the breach. In such cases, the contractor shall provide the controller with at least the following information:
annotations.translation: 承包者应及时向主计长通报有关个人数据失窃的情况，最迟应在承包者获悉失窃情况后48小时内通报。在这种情况下，承包者应至少向主计长提供下列资料：

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The contractor shall immediately inform the data controller if, in its opinion, an instruction infringes Regulation (EU) 2018/1725, Regulation (EU) 2016/679, or other Union or Member State data protection provisions as referred to in the tender specifications.
annotations.translation: 如果承包商认为某项指示违反了法规 (EU)  2018/1725、法规 (EU) 2016/679或招标规范中提及的其他欧盟或成员国数据保护规定，承包商应立即通知数据控制者。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The contractor shall assist the controller for the fulfilment of its obligations pursuant to Article 33 to 41 under Regulation (EU) 2018/1725 to:
annotations.translation: 承包商应协助控制者履行 2018/1725号条例 (EU) 第33条至第41条规定的义务，以：

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The contractor shall maintain a record of all data processing operations carried on behalf of the controller, transfers of personal data, security breaches, responses to requests for exercising rights of people whose personal data is processed and requests for access to personal data by third parties.
annotations.translation: 承包商应保留代表控制者进行的所有数据处理操作、个人数据传输、安全漏洞、对个人数据被处理者行使权利的请求的响应以及第三方访问个人数据的请求的记录。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The contracting authority is subject to Protocol 7 of the Treaty on the Functioning of the European Union on the privileges and immunities of the European Union, particularly as regards the inviolability of archives (including the physical location of data and services as set out in Article 1.9.2) and data security, which includes personal data held on behalf of the contracting authority in the premises of the contractor or subcontractor.
annotations.translation: 订约当局受《欧洲联盟运作条约》关于欧洲联盟特权和豁免的第7号议定书的约束，特别是在档案馆的不可侵犯性（包括第1.9.2条规定的数据和服务的实际位置）和数据安全方面，其中包括代表订约当局在承包商或分包商房地持有的个人数据。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The contractor shall notify the contracting authority without delay of any legally binding request for disclosure of the personal data processed on behalf of the contracting authority made by any national public authority, including an authority from a third country. The contractor may not give such access without the prior written authorisation of the contracting authority.
annotations.translation: 对于任何国家公共当局，包括第三国当局，代表订约当局提出的任何具有法律约束力的个人数据处理披露请求，承包商应立即通知订约当局。未经订约当局事先书面授权，承包商不得授予此类访问权限。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The duration of processing of personal data by the contractor will not exceed the period referred to in Article 11.24.2. Upon expiry of this period, the contractor shall, at the choice of the controller, return, without any undue delay in a commonly agreed format, all personal data processed on behalf of the controller and the copies thereof or shall effectively delete all personal data unless Union or national law requires a longer storage of personal data.
annotations.translation: 承包商处理个人数据的持续时间将不超过第11.24.2条所述的期限。在此期限届满后，承包商应根据控制者的选择，以共同商定的格式归还代表控制者处理的所有个人数据及其副本，不得有任何不当拖延，或应有效删除所有个人数据，除非工会或国家法律要求更长时间存储个人数据。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: For the purpose of Article II.10, if part or all of the processing of personal data is subcontracted to a third party, the contractor shall pass on the obligations referred to in Articles 1.9.2 and II.9.2 in writing to those parties, including subcontractors. At the request of the contracting authority, the contractor shall provide a document providing evidence of this commitment.
annotations.translation: 就第 II.10 条而言，如果部分或全部个人数据处理分包给第三方，承包商应将第 1.9.2 条和第 II.9.2 条中提到的义务以书面形式转嫁给第三方，包括分包商。应订约当局的要求，承包商应提供一份文件，证明该承诺。

annotations.label: Page-header
annotations.text: EC - FWC services Dec 2018
annotations.translation: EC - FWC服务，2018年12月

annotations.label: Picture
annotations.text: image
annotations.translation: 图像

annotations.label: Page-header
annotations.text: European Agency for Safety and Health at Work
annotations.translation: 欧洲工作安全与健康局

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Contract no: [complete]
annotations.translation: 合同编号：[完成]

annotations.label: Picture
annotations.text: Image
annotations.translation: 图片

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: d) a process for regularly testing, assessing and evaluating the effectiveness of technical and organisational measures for ensuring the security of the processing;
annotations.translation: d) 定期检测、评估和评价确保处理安全的技术和组织措施有效性的程序；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: e) measures to protect personal data from accidental or unlawful destruction, loss, alteration, unauthorised disclosure of or access to personal data transmitted, stored or otherwise processed.
annotations.translation: e) 保护个人数据免遭意外或非法破坏、丢失、更改、未经授权披露或访问传输、存储或以其他方式处理的个人数据的措施。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: a) nature of the personal data breach including where possible, the categories and approximate number of data subjects concerned and the categories and approximate number of personal data records concerned;
annotations.translation: a) 个人数据泄露的性质，包括在可能的情况下，相关数据主体的类别和大致数量以及相关个人数据记录的类别和大致数量；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: b) likely consequences of the breach;
annotations.translation: b) 违约的可能后果;

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: c) measures taken or proposed to be taken to address the breach, including, where appropriate, measures to mitigate its possible adverse effects.
annotations.translation: c) 为解决违规行为而采取或拟采取的措施，包括在适当情况下减轻其可能产生的不利影响的措施。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: a) ensure compliance with its data protection obligations regarding the security of the processing, and the confidentiality of electronic communications and directories of users;
annotations.translation: a) 确保履行其在数据处理安全、电子通信保密和用户名录方面的数据保护义务；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: b) notify a personal data breach to the European Data Protection Supervisor;
annotations.translation: b) 向欧洲数据保护主管通知个人数据泄露;

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: c) communicate a personal data breach without undue delay to the data subject, where applicable;
annotations.translation: c) 在适用的情况下，毫不拖延地向数据主体传达个人数据泄露信息；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: carry out data protection impact assessments and prior consultations as necessary.
annotations.translation: 必要时进行数据保护影响评估和事先协商。
